import Logo from '../Assets/logo.png' import {PhoneIcon, UserIcon} from '@heroicons/react/24/outline' import {ShoppingBagIcon} from "@heroicons/react/24/outline"; import {HeartIcon} from "@heroicons/react/24/outline"; import SubMenu from "./SubMenu"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import {allProducts} from "../Api/allProducts"; const NavBar = () => { const {data: products} = allProducts() return ( <>
) } export default NavBar
